<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/tags/{tagId}"}

</MethodEndpoint>



Retrieve a single tag by its ID, including the number of bookmarks using it.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}

</Heading>
